text: Paul Gregory (1908–1999) was a Major League pitcher and a college coach. Paul Gregory may also refer to: *Paul Gregory (lighting designer) (born 1952), president and founder of Focus Lighting *Paul Gregory (producer) (1920–2015), American film and theatre producer *Paul R. Gregory (born 1949), English fantasy artist *Paul Roderick Gregory, professor of economics, University of Houston, Texas *Paul Gregory (squash player) (born 1968), English squash player ==See also== *Paul Gregory Bootkoski (born 1940), bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Metuchen *Gregory Paul (disambiguation)
title: Paul Gregory (disambiguation)
